New Records: Liam Livingstone scored a career-best 124 not out
Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone and Sam Curran combined for a key partnership
Liam Livingstone blazed 22 off five deliveries
Liam Livingstone struck Shamar Joseph for three consecutive sixes and a four to win the match
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Liam Livingstone implored his side to 'bat smarter' after their defeat in the opening match
Post-Match Reflections: Liam Livingstone expressed his happiness to have led from the front and proved why he should be given more responsibility in an England shirt
Miscellaneous Highlights: The West Indies total of 328 was a record ODI total at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium
England used nine bowlers across an innings, a first in their history
Four catches were dropped and sloppy fielding mistakes were made by England in the field
